snippet: To mark its 125th anniversary, the University of Pennsylvania Museum of Archaeology and Anthropology is undertaking an ambitious effort to become more accessible to the public.
abstract: Philadelphia's University of Pennsylvania Museum of Archaeology and Anthropology, treasure trove for scholars researching ancient civilizations, will undertake an ambitious effort to become more accessible to the public.
lead_paragraph: To mark its 125th anniversary, the University of Pennsylvania Museum of Archaeology and Anthropology is undertaking an ambitious effort to become more accessible to the public.

headline.seo: Penn Museum Pushes for Broader Public Appeal
headline.main: A Museum Full of Antiquities Embraces Modernity
headline.print_headline: A Museum Full of Antiquities Embraces Modernity
